name: Treaure and Ice
description:
Bring Treasure back to your home but beware of unstable ice! Recommended to be played locally with 4 people because AI is very basic. For no AI, select four players.

Perma Death option means if you fall through ice you are permanently out of the round.

Player 1 - AWSD Player 2 - arrow keys Player 3 - fcvb Player 4 - ijkl
